reviewText: He does a good job introducing some beginning and maybe intermediate points about the game (the title is accurate). For the price, I would have expected a lot more. A little disappointing for the money.
Excellent product line as advertised.  Great instructional DVD from the expert of Rball.  I will buy another series of video from the instructor.

I played RB about a month while reading a book about the game and then decided to hunt for DVDs when I found this one.  It's great and I believe has helped my game improve.  I've develped more confidence from Mr. Hogan's easy to understand explanations and examples.
